explains: adj. 冰的；冰冷的；冰河时代的
wordGroup: glacial acetic acid 冰醋酸；冰乙酸
glacial ice 冰川冰；流动冰
glacial epoch [地]冰川期；冰河时期

sentences.en: Isotopic analysis of shells allowed geologists to measure another glacial effect.
sentences.cn: 对贝壳的同位素分析使得地质学家可以测量另一种冰川效应。

sentences.en: In all these diverse regions, Agassiz saw signs of glacial erosion and sedimentation.
sentences.cn: 在这些不同的地区，Agassiz 都能发现冰川侵蚀和沉降的痕迹。

sentences.en: The glacial system is governed by two basic climatic variables: precipitation and temperature.
sentences.cn: 冰川系统由两个基本的气候变量控制：降水和温度。
